AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was traumatized by the violence that took [PAWN_possessive] parents away and swore to never inflict that on someone else.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: adopted child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was adopted at a young age by human parents from the Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] did not learn much about [PAWN_possessive] home planet or the Seren culture. [PAWN_pronoun] often feel isolated from other Seren because of it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren prophecy child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on the day that all the stars aligned on Panastria, fulfilling a minor prophecy from one of the local fortune-tellers. [PAWN_pronoun] was treated like royalty by the locals and pampered into adulthood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: stardust child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was said to have fallen from the sky, a new Seren created from the stardust in space before falling to Panastria. A local astronomer alleged found [PAWN_possessive] after witnessing [PAWN_possessive] fall, but it is unknown whether this tale is true.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: space station child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a Seren space station orbiting one of Panastria's moons. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] entire childhood on the space station, having no contact with any plants or animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: homeless child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived with [PAWN_possessive] parents on the streets of Panastria. While the planet and the Seren presented themselves as a utopia of prosperity and art, [PAWN_nameDef] lived as a stark reminder of the reality of the wealth disparity in Panastria.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren slave child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped at a young age and sold into slavery in the Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to do whatever [PAWN_possessive] master ordered [PAWN_pronoun] to do, no matter how dangerous or inhumane it was.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren prodigy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child prodigy. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in school and received praises from almost every teacher [PAWN_pronoun] have had.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren noble child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into Panastrian nobility. [PAWN_pronoun] ate food from the best cooks, dressed in the finest clothes, and attended the best schools, but [PAWN_pronoun] was too used to the lifestyle to appreciate any of it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bastard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a prostitute and a nobleman in a Panastrian brothel. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in the brothel with [PAWN_possessive] mother and was forced by the owner to clean and do other types of manual labor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: unfortunate child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born under unfortunate stars, and was ostracized from [PAWN_possessive] community because of it. [PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] childhood friendless.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a relative of a well-known artisan on Panastria. This artisan took a liking to [PAWN_nameDef], so they agreed to take [PAWN_pronoun] under their wing. [PAWN_pronoun] learned from the best starting at a young age and excelled from there.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren astropath-in-training
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen for life as an astropath, a religious leader of Caelestism, for [PAWN_possessive] latent psychic sensitivity. [PAWN_pronoun] taken into the monastery and blinded during [PAWN_possessive] induction ceremony, as all members were, so [PAWN_pronoun] could focus on honing [PAWN_possessive] abilities. [PAWN_pronoun] lived and meditated at the monastery for the rest of [PAWN_possessive] childhood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren feral child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were killed during the Seren Uprising and [PAWN_pronoun] was left alone, in the ruins of [PAWN_possessive] home. [PAWN_pronoun] was driven to one of the few forests left on Panastria and lived among the wildlife.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: panastrian archives assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen by lottery to be removed from [PAWN_possessive] home and work with seren elders in the ancient Panastrian archives. [PAWN_pronoun] would run information and transcribe articles for their elder masters as they so desired, hoping that [PAWN_pronoun] would be able to rise into the role of archivist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: quiet child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a quiet child growing up. [PAWN_pronoun] made few friends and did not quite connect with many people, but those who got to know [PAWN_pronoun] were able to see [PAWN_possessive] more creative and intelligent sides.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: child actor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child actor on a popular Panastrian television show. [PAWN_pronoun] spent many hours perfecting [PAWN_possessive] acting skills and memorizing [PAWN_possessive] scenes, which left them somewhat lacking in many skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Seren Uprising POW
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier in the uprising against the Empire. During combat, [PAWN_pronoun] was wounded and captured by Empire soldiers. [PAWN_pronoun] spent the last few years of [PAWN_possessive] life in an Empire prison ship. They got to know their fellow inmates and even their guards very well by the time they were released.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren prostitute
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a civilian living in Empire territory during the Seren Uprising. Social pressures, economic troubles, and a growing Seren fetishization in the Empire pushed [PAWN_possessive] into prostitution. [PAWN_pronoun] learned quickly how to get what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted through honeyed words.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren war profiteer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was elated to hear about the beginning of the uprising. [PAWN_pronoun] gained massive profits selling weapons, food, and other goods to the Seren warfront. However, after the Empire's victory, [PAWN_nameDef] was stripped of [PAWN_possessive] wealth and briefly jailed.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Seren Uprising soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Panastrian army once the rebellion against the Empire began. [PAWN_pronoun] fought on the frontlines until the end of the uprising.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: spaceship pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot that worked for private companies both on Panastria and throughout Empire territory. [PAWN_pronoun] avoided much of the conflict that came with the uprising and instead worked transporting goods and contrband across the galaxy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren fortune-teller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fortune-teller on Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to read the position of the stars to tell the fortunes of those who sought [PAWN_possessive] wisdom. [PAWN_pronoun] held a higher social status than most because of her career, and [PAWN_pronoun] made sure to utilize it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren biologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been enamored with life. [PAWN_pronoun] traveled to many worlds, documenting and studying the native plant and animal life. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a relatively peaceful and fulfilled life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: space salvager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a space salvager that would sweep through areas of debris after space battles. [PAWN_pronoun] made a decent living selling the scrap metal, valuables, and dead bodies back to their families.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren combat medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in the Seren Uprising. Because of [PAWN_possessive] prior medical knowledge, [PAWN_pronoun] was trained as a combat medic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a sculptor on Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] created grand statues and sculptures to be enjoyed by high society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren graffiti artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a grafitti artist on Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] art to protest the Empire occupation and rally people behind the rebelling cause.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren pop star
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an interplanetary pop star, well-known throughout Panastria, the Empire, and other planets in the solar system. [PAWN_pronoun] gave no comment on [PAWN_possessive] feelings about the Seren Uprising in an attempt to protect [PAWN_possessive] career, but after the uprising failed, [PAWN_pronoun] was treated like every other Seren.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren homeless
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on the streets of Panastria. While the planet and the Seren presented themselves as a utopia of prosperity and art, [PAWN_nameDef] lived as a stark reminder of the reality of the wealth disparity in Panastria.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was kidnapped and sold into slavery in the Empire. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to do whatever [PAWN_possessive] master ordered [PAWN_pronoun] to do, no matter how dangerous or inhumane it was.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren traveling chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a traveling chef who would travel to different planets to try the cuisine and attempt to recreate it. [PAWN_pronoun] gained some notoriety for [PAWN_possessive] travels, cooking, and the occasional cookbook.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren diplomat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an interstellar diplomat on behalf of Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] would travel throughout the galaxy to attend interplanetary political meetings. [PAWN_pronoun] watched the relations between Panastria and the Empire sour as the Seren Uprising began.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren gem miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gem miner. [PAWN_pronoun] would harvest the gems from below the mountains of Panastria and either craft them into jewelry or sell them to sculptorrs or other artisans.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: former psycaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a psycaster and high ranking official on Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] led [PAWN_possessive] troops against the Empire in the Seren Uprising. After the Seren defeat, [PAWN_nameDef] was captured and had their Psylink neuroformer surgically removed, taking away [PAWN_possessive] psychic abilities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren thief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a thief. [PAWN_pronoun] stole from anyone and everyone that did not keep an eye on their valuables. The Seren Uprising only emboldened [PAWN_nameDef], who began stealing from the homes of those who were out fighting.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: imperial serial killer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had many members of [PAWN_possessive] family die fighting in the Seren Uprising. [PAWN_pronoun] began hating all the people of the Empire and turned to killing Imperial civilians in secret to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] bloodlust and hatred.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: astronomer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an astronomer on Panastria. Unlike the many fortune-tellers and spiritualist of the planet, [PAWN_pronoun] studied the stars and planets scientifically rather than religiously.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren confectioner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a confectioner on Panastria, specializing in different types of hard candies. Not only did [PAWN_pronoun] create sweet treats and candies, but [PAWN_pronoun] also became popular with [PAWN_possessive] sweet-toothed customers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: uprising sniper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a sniper during the Seren Uprising. [PAWN_pronoun] were trained as an elite sniper for [PAWN_possessive] innate accuracy and shooting abilities.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: recluse
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a social recluse. [PAWN_pronoun] secretly withdrew into the emergency underground bunkers on Panastria to live away from the rest of society. Nobody found [PAWN_pronoun] until the Empire searched the bunkers for any valuables after the Seren Uprising.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: panastrian archivist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of Panastria's official archivists. [PAWN_pronoun] were tasked with archiving everything that happened on Panastria down to the minute detail. Everything was up for transcription and archiving, and it was [PAWN_nameDef]'s job to make sure that it was done well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: translator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a translator for Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years learning and practicing many alien languages, helping to advance the serens' understanding of other languages and cultures from many different planets.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: bioengineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bioengineer on Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] was tasked with creating an alternative source of food in case of an emergency, so [PAWN_pronoun] studied plant and animal life in the hopes of creating a more efficient food source. Unfortunately, [PAWN_possessive] work was destroyed when [PAWN_pronoun] was taken into Imperial custody.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: gown tailor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gown tailor on Panastria. [PAWN_pronoun] was commissioned by the nobility, rich, and famous of Panastria to create extravagant, beautiful gowns to be shown off at dances and galas. [PAWN_pronoun] would painstakingly create each gown by hand, and for [PAWN_possessive] immense efforts, [PAWN_pronoun] was not always fairly paid.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: civil engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of planning for the most important parts of every Panastrian citizens' lives: their bridges, tunnels, buildings, and many more. While [PAWN_pronoun] was not often doing the construction, [PAWN_pronoun] knows [PAWN_possessive] way around tools and a construction site.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: plastic surgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was employed as a plastic surgeon on Panastria. Looks began to dominate the minds of the uppercrust of Panastria, and [PAWN_nameDef] was there to serve their desires. While [PAWN_pronoun] only worked on the appearances of others for [PAWN_possessive] career, [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to perform other surgeries as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: drug dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] operated in shady houses and abadoned buildings. [PAWN_pronoun] created illegal drugs in these places, selling it to whoever paid the right price. The homeless and the rich sought out [PAWN_nameDef] for the highs and lows [PAWN_pronoun] created.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: seren astropath
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an astropath, a religious leader for Panastria's planetary religion known as Caelestism. [PAWN_pronoun] was blinded as a child so [PAWN_pronoun] could focus on honing her psychic abilities. [PAWN_nameDef] was believed to be able to speak with the stars themselves and would bless Caelestians with what [PAWN_pronoun] learned in religious ceremonies.
